densities.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  =================================
00002 !
00003 !    3D Density gather for rhoi
00004 !
00005 !  =================================
00006 
00007 subroutine densities
00008 
00009   use physvars
00010   use treevars
00011 
00012   implicit none
00013   include 'mpif.h'
00014 
00015   real :: rdx, rdy, rdz, dx, dy, dz, cweight
00016   real :: fx1, fx2, fy1, fy2, fz1, fz2, xa, ya, za
00017   integer :: i, j, k, ng, i1, i2, j1, j2, k1, k2, jfoc, kfoc
00018   integer :: ierr
00019   character(30) :: cfile
00020   character(5) :: cme
00021   character(6) :: cdump, cvis
00022 
00023   dx = xl/ngx
00024   dy = yl/ngy
00025   dz = zl/ngz
00026   rdx = 1./dx
00027   rdy = 1./dy
00028   rdz = 1./dz
00029 
00030 
00031   !  field box limits: (0-xl, 0-yl, 0-zl)
00032   !  Any particle outside gets put in ghost cells 0, ngx+1
00033 
00034   !      write(15,'(//a,3f12.3)') 'cw,dx,dy',cweight,dx,dy
00035 
00036   rhoi_loc(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) = 0.
00037 
00038   do i=1,npp
00039 
00040      xa=x(i)*rdx
00041      ya=y(i)*rdy
00042      za=z(i)*rdz
00043 
00044      !  indices
00045      i1=xa+1
00046      i2=i1+1
00047      j1=ya+1
00048      j2=j1+1
00049      k1=za+1
00050      k2=k1+1
00051 
00052      i1 = min(max(0,i1),ngx+1)
00053      i2 = min(max(0,i2),ngx+1)
00054      j1 = min(max(0,j1),ngy+1)
00055      j2 = min(max(0,j2),ngy+1)
00056      k1 = min(max(0,k1),ngz+1)
00057      k2 = min(max(0,k2),ngz+1)
00058 
00059      !  linear weighting
00060      fx2=min(max(i1-xa,0.),1.)  ! Prevent overflow/negative weighting for particles outside box
00061      fx1=1.-fx2
00062      fy2=min(max(j1-ya,0.),1.)
00063      fy1=1.-fy2
00064      fz2=min(max(k1-za,0.),1.)
00065      fz1=1.-fz2
00066 
00067      !  gather charge at nearest grid points
00068      if (q(i)>0) then
00069         cweight = q(i)*rdx*rdy*rdz       ! charge weighting factor
00070 
00071         rhoi_loc(i1,j1,k1)=rhoi_loc(i1,j1,k1) + cweight*fx1*fy1*fz1
00072         rhoi_loc(i2,j1,k1)=rhoi_loc(i2,j1,k1) + cweight*fx2*fy1*fz1
00073         rhoi_loc(i1,j2,k1)=rhoi_loc(i1,j2,k1) + cweight*fx1*fy2*fz1
00074         rhoi_loc(i2,j2,k1)=rhoi_loc(i2,j2,k1) + cweight*fx2*fy2*fz1
00075         rhoi_loc(i1,j1,k2)=rhoi_loc(i1,j1,k2) + cweight*fx1*fy1*fz2
00076         rhoi_loc(i2,j1,k2)=rhoi_loc(i2,j1,k2) + cweight*fx2*fy1*fz2
00077         rhoi_loc(i1,j2,k2)=rhoi_loc(i1,j2,k2) + cweight*fx1*fy2*fz2
00078         rhoi_loc(i2,j2,k2)=rhoi_loc(i2,j2,k2) + cweight*fx2*fy2*fz2
00079      else
00080 
00081      endif
00082   end do
00083 
00084   ng = (ngx+2)*(ngy+2)*(ngz+2)                         ! total # gridpoints
00085 ! gather on root
00086   call MPI_REDUCE(rhoi_loc, rhoi, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, 0,  MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00087 !  call MPI_REDUCE(rhoe_loc, rhoe, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, 0,  MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00088 
00089 end subroutine densities
